# add(_:)

**Instance Method**

Registers to receive a daily report of app metrics from the metrics manager.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ subscriber: any MXMetricManagerSubscriber)
```

## Parameters

- **subscriber**: The object that receives the daily metrics reports. The object must conform to [doc://com.apple.metrickit/documentation/MetricKit/MXMetricManagerSubscriber].

## Discussion



## Subscribing to reports

- **remove(_:)**: Unsubscribes from daily reports of app metrics.
